name: Frameshock
description:
Fly through ever changing frames, roll and rotate to avoid obstacles and customize yourself with mind-blowing characters.

Features:
- Fly in an endless labyrinth of frames
- Collect coins
- Get boosts
- Unlock new characters
- Challenge friends with Game Center

How to play:
- Tap to change direction of your rotation
- Avoid collisions with frames
- Collect coins to unlock new characters


Make sure to follow us on Instagram @nanovationlabs for the latest games!
